name: Funkit
0:
”Alexa, ask fun kit to teach me a game”
”Alexa, things to try in fun kit”
”Alexa, Tell fun kit to make me happy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun kit
des: We all miss our old classic games that we used to play with our friends right. Some of those games are at edge of extinction. So here we have Classic game skill that teaches our kids some of the classic games like hide and seek, peek-a-boo, Anthakshari etc in much easier and simpler way. Let our kids also get the life we got!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
